column4: hey there whenever i start synaptic i get some errors like these W: Couldn't stat source package list http://us.archive.ubuntu.com breezy/universe Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/us.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_breezy_universe_binary-i386_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
any 1 has an idea why i'm getting these
the US archives are probably acting up again - edit your sources to just use the main archives
